original: go rims bzhin du cha re bskyed cing dri'i sbyor ba brgyad pa phrag gnyis dang // bzhi ba'i sbyor ba'ang nyi shu las ni gnyis kyis nyung bar gyis shig 'dzangs ma mo //

translated: The eight ingredients of the perfume should be increased by one part each in turn, and the twenty-four ingredients of the fourth application should be reduced by two.

translated: In the places of agaru, kunkuma, turu·π£ka, gandhatha, priya·πÖgu, and sandalwood,

original: sug smel pa mu ru rta bya ku re'u mig tsor gzhag bya zhing //
analyzed: sug smel pa mu ru rta bya ku re'u mig tsor gzhag bya zhing //
translated: one should place ≈õa·πÖkhinƒ´, pa·π≠ala, murubaka, kuruvinda, and tsori.

original: shing tsha'i gnas su gran ti bzhag cing de yi cha las gsum du bsgyur byas te //
analyzed: shing tsha'i gnas su gran ti bzhag cing de yi cha las gsum du bsgyur byas te //
translated: In the place of ≈õigru, one should place granthi, and divide it into three parts.

original: de dag sbyor ba re ltar byas pas khrus kyi cho ga'i sbyor ba'i rnam pa yin //
analyzed: de dag sbyor ba re ltar byas pas khrus kyi cho ga'i sbyor ba'i rnam pa yin //
translated: By applying each of these, one should perform the ritual of bathing.

original: sha ta ma rtan mur pi dri li ni de ba n'a ge sar //
analyzed: sha ta ma rtan mur pi dri li ni de ba n'a ge sar //
translated: ≈öatƒÅvarƒ´, murƒÅ, dƒ´pyakƒÅ, devagajaka, and saralaüîΩare the ingredients of the outer perfume.

original: dran tshe'i gnas su seng phrom ha man gsum bzhag dri phyi'i sbyor ba yin //
analyzed: dran tshe'i gnas su seng phrom ha man gsum bzhag dri phyi'i sbyor ba yin //
translated: In the place of dhataki, one should place sengmena and the three.

original: shing tsha ta mal pri yang tsan dan ru rta seng phrom dang ni shu dag dang // sthe'u na cha drug ldan pa'i rim pa ba lang phru gu lta bur sreg pa yin /
analyzed: shing tsha ta mal pri yang tsan dan ru rta seng phrom dang ni shu dag dang // sthe'u na cha drug ldan pa'i rim pa ba lang phru gu lta bur sreg pa yin /
translated: The incense is burned in a layer like a calf.

original: ga bur sprang rtsi ka ra gur kum ma tu lung ga'i bdug spos sbyor ba ste //
analyzed: ga bur sprang rtsi ka ra gur kum ma tu lung ga'i bdug spos sbyor ba ste //
translated: The incense is a mixture of camphor, bee-wax, sugar, saffron, and matulunga.

original: rgya skyegs du ru ka dang spra tshil sbyar ba ngag ni bdug spos reng bu yin //
analyzed: rgya skyegs du ru ka dang spra tshil sbyar ba ngag ni bdug spos reng bu yin //
translated: The incense stick is a mixture of lac, duruka, and resin.

original: ru rta ge sar shu ti aa mra tso ra dag dang sbyar ba btung ba bsgo ba yin //üîΩspos rgyal shu ti sug smel aa mra ru rta sbyar ba zhal la bsgo ba yin //
analyzed: ru rta ge sar shu ti aa mra tso ra dag dang sbyar ba btung ba bsgo ba yin // spos rgyal shu ti sug smel aa mra ru rta sbyar ba zhal la bsgo ba yin //
translated: The drink is prescribed as a mixture of rut-fluid, kesar, shuti, and amra-tsora.üîΩThe mouth-incense is prescribed as a mixture of incense king, shuti, zhati, and rut-fluid.

original: aa @18b kar tsan dan sthe'u na ge sar mkhan pa shu ti aa smra ru rta dang // du ru ka dang sbyar ba til mar dri zhim bsgo ba'i sbyor ba yin //
analyzed: aa @18b kar tsan dan sthe'u na ge sar mkhan pa shu ti aa smra ru rta dang // du ru ka dang sbyar ba til mar dri zhim bsgo ba'i sbyor ba yin //
translated: The fragrant oil prescription is a mixture of agarwood, zhati, kesar, mkhanpa, shuti, ashmara, rut-fluid, and duruka.

original: de ltar kho bos khyod la phan bar bya phyir sna tshogs rnam par brtag byas pa //
analyzed: de ltar kho bos khyod la phan bar bya phyir sna tshogs rnam par brtag byas pa //
translated: Thus, I have examined various things for your benefit.

original: bde bar gshegs pa'i pho brang rkyen du 'os pa'i dri dang bdug pa'i sbyor ba yin //
analyzed: bde bar gshegs pa'i pho brang rkyen du 'os pa'i dri dang bdug pa'i sbyor ba yin //
translated: This is the proper incense offering for the palace of the Sugatas.

original: dri sbyar ba'i mig mngas ris kyi sbyor ba tshig le'ur byas pa slob dpon klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so//
analyzed: dri sbyar ba'i mig mngas ris kyi sbyor ba tshig le'ur byas pa slob dpon klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so//
translated: The composition of the dice-play of the incense offering, composed by the master Nagarjuna, is complete.
